imrijka.name: Imrijka
imrijka.description: Half-orc orphans aren’t a common sight in the church of Pharasma, goddess of fate and death. But Imrijka isn’t a common half-orc. Taken in by the church’s high exorcist and trained as an inquisitor, Imrijka brings judgment to all who would violate the laws of life and death, keeping close a mysterious disk that might hold the key to the truth of her parentage. Imrijka’s seen it all. She faces the future with courage and faith.

salim.name: Salim
salim.description: Salim Ghadafar was originally an offcer in Rahadoum’s Pure Legion, purging any traces of religion from the nation’s shores, until tragedy led him to swear fealty to Pharasma. Watched over by the psychopomp usher Ceyanan, Salim now travels the planes as an unwilling inquisitor for the Lady of Graves, tracking down souls that have gone missing and bringing the death goddess’s justice to those who would cheat her.

varril.name: Varril
varril.description: Varril is a living illustration of the story of Shelyn, the goddess of beauty, and her half-brother Zon-Kuthon, god of destruction. Varril’s parents lived as priests of Shelyn, raising their son as a generous servant of Absalom’s people. This was all well and good until they revealed themselves as cultists of Zon-Kuthon and burned the temple to the ground. The terrible loss of life—which included his parents—has haunted Varril; he has pledged ever since to make up for their actions
